lines.text: What are you animals doing on *my* hill?
This is the only green spot left... or was.
Was is right! What happened here, anyway?
Noah came here a few weeks ago and cut down all the trees!
Said he was sorry, but he had to build a big boat!
A boat? What would would he want with a boat?
*That's* ridiculous! There's no deep water for maybe a thousand miles!
That's right! But he went ahead and he built one anyway.
If you don't believe us, look for yourselves!

[amidst ruins of city]
Man chased all the animals away to build this place.
So he moves on and leaves us with *his* mistakes!
Uh, *imagine*! A boat on a farm!
And Noah's been working day and night!
We can't get a wink of sleep!

[scorning]
So what's his hurry? He sure isn't going anywhere in *that* contraption!
Unless he puts wheels on it!

[after hearing Noah appointed him to find land]
The *raven*?
Now, there are good reasons for this!
*I* can't even think of any!
[the others in her group chuckle]
